verses.roman:
ācāryādi vaiṣṇavere mahā-prasāda dilā
prabhura yaiche ājñā, paṇḍita tāhā ācarilā

synonyms: ācārya-ādi—headed by Advaita Ācārya; vaiṣṇavere—to all the Vaiṣṇavas; mahā-prasāda dilā—delivered all the prasāda of Lord Jagannātha; prabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; yaiche—as; ājñā—the order; paṇḍita—Dāmodara Paṇḍita; tāhā—that; ācarilā—performed.
translation: He delivered all the prasāda to such great Vaiṣṇavas as Advaita Ācārya. Thus he stayed there and behaved according to the order of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
